meta_title: Six Sigma Definition: Improving Industrial Reliability
meta_description: Six Sigma is a statistical methodology used to reduce process defects and variability. It provides a framework for maximizing asset uptime and manufacturing quality.
title: What is Six Sigma?

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What is Six Sigma?

image_prompt: A high-tech industrial control room where a diverse team of maintenance engineers in professional PPE (high-visibility vests and hard hats) are analyzing complex data visualizations and bell curves on a large, glowing glass screen. The background shows a clean, modern manufacturing floor with advanced robotic systems. The lighting is professional and bright, emphasizing a high-tech, data-driven industrial environment. Photo-realistic, 8k resolution, no text.
